host.label: API Domain
host.description: Specify the domain for region that your OneLogin account resides in

port.label: Host Port
port.description: Set the port number that is associated with the API Domain

help.label: Need additional help?
help.description: More details on the data source setting can be found in the specified link

selfSignedCert.label: IBM QRadar Certificate
selfSignedCert.description: Use self-signed SSL certificate for QRadar V7.3.1 and CA content(root and intermediate) for QRadar V7.3.2. Not Required for QRadar on Cloud.

sni.label: Server Name Indicator
sni.description: The Server Name Indicator (SNI) enables a separate hostname to be provided for SSL authentication. Not Required for QRadar on Cloud.
